title: useReducer does not work when I use it with combineReducers on the latest react version (but it works on alpha version)
body:
**Do you want to request a *feature* or report a *bug*?**
bug

**What is the current behavior?**
I tried to create custom hooks for the global state (like redux) but it works fine on react alpha version. (16.7.0-alpha.0)

But when I upgrade react and react-dom to the latest version (16.8.6), it looks like action inside useReducer is missing.

I'm not sure this is becase my custom hooks or useReducer hooks or combineReducers (from redux).

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4003032/55144709-03018c00-5174-11e9-817a-55fca206d812.png)

**If the current behavior is a bug, please provide the steps to reproduce and if possible a minimal demo of the problem. Your bug will get fixed much faster if we can run your code and it doesn't have dependencies other than React. Paste the link to your JSFiddle (https://jsfiddle.net/Luktwrdm/) or CodeSandbox (https://codesandbox.io/s/new) example below:**

https://codesandbox.io/s/mq5jlvrm98

try to upgrade react version for reproduce.


**What is the expected behavior?**

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4003032/55145250-faf61c00-5174-11e9-9332-a3b06a3dcf22.png)


**Which versions of React, and which browser / OS are affected by this issue? Did this work in previous versions of React?**
it works fine on react version 16.7.0-alpha.0.
it does not work on react version 16.8.6.

https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/14624#issuecomment-461872785
